atbat.des: Jason Bartlett called out on strikes.

atbat.des: Ryan Ludwick singles on a soft line drive to left fielder Darnell McDonald.

atbat.des: Jesus Guzman grounds into a force out, second baseman Dustin Pedroia to shortstop Marco Scutaro. Ryan Ludwick out at 2nd.

Jacoby Ellsbury recibe base por bolas.

pitch.cc: Cory Luebke is really trying to keep Jacoby Ellsbury close; he is 24-for-33 in stolen base attempts this season.

atbat.des: Adrian Gonzalez doubles (25) on a fly ball to left fielder Ryan Ludwick. Dustin Pedroia scores.
atbat.des_es: Adrian Gonzalez pega doble (25) con elevado a jardinero izquierdo Ryan Ludwick. Dustin Pedroia anota.

action.des: Pitching Change: Ernesto Frieri replaces Cory Luebke.

atbat.des: Kevin Youkilis flies out to left fielder Ryan Ludwick.
atbat.des_es: Kevin Youkilis batea elevado de out a jardinero izquierdo Ryan Ludwick.

pitch.cc: Ernesto Frieri may prefer to go after Kevin Youkilis, whose OPS is .869 this season, with the four-seam fastball rather than facing David Ortiz, whose OPS is .990.
Ernesto Frieri battled back from 3-0 to retire Kevin Youkilis.

atbat.des: Ernesto Frieri intentionally walks David Ortiz.
atbat.des_es: Ernesto Frieri recibe base por bolas intencional David Ortiz.
